column1: ÃŽnfrastructive demand for new wardrobes is soaring thanks to stimulus checks and pent up demand built during the pandemic . supply chain bottlenecks and slowdowns at key ports around the globe have tightened brands inventories . the national retail federation expects retail sales to grow between 10.5 and 13.5 to more than 4.44 trillion this year . victoria is secret and bath body works is the parent of calvin klein and tommy hilfiger .
